post:
![](http://i.imgur.com/LOaBGll.png)

IgniteServers has been around for 2 months now, we started off offering only OpenVZ with RAID1 HDD drives on OVH network out of Quebec Canada. Over the past 2 months we have we have been building a strong foundation in the hosting industry, working on innovation for our customer, thus involving a custom user control panel (Coming Soon) and our in house 5Gbps DDoS Protection for our LAX (Quadranet DC) location which is in the (Beta 1.0) you can also test that for free using our KVM servers (LAX). At this moment we offer KVM (LAX), OpenVZ (Canada) and also Dedicated Servers (Kansas City, MO). 

We offer 99.8% uptime guarantee on all locations as well as free DDoS protection whether it is in our LAX location, Canada location or our Kansas City location. We strive to maintain great customer support and keep our ticket time as low as possible, we are available 24/7 367 days a year. 

Last Month Ticket Review 
![](http://i.imgur.com/QkruiRY.png)

Plan Features:  Varies Per Location 

- Unlimited High Quality Transfer (Canada Only for Unlimited) Limited Transfer (LAX)

- RAID10 Arrays (LAX Only) RAID1 (Canada)

- Registered DDR4 RAM (CANADA) DDR3 - 1333 EEC (LAX)

- Low Ping for US & Canada Locations - LAX Great Connectivity to Asia

- CacheVault Modules - Writeback Caching - So Great Disk I/O Speeds

- Premium Server Management / Premium Support @ 20$/mo


**-KVM Plan Location (LAX)** 

>- 512MB DDR3-1333 EEC REG. RAM 
>- 2 Dedicated Cores @ 2.5Ghz
>- 50GB SATA 7 200 RPM Enterprise RAID10 ARRAYS (Cached)
>- 2000GB High Quality Transfer @ 1000Mbps Public Network Uplink (Shared)
>- 1 Clean IPv4 - 1IPv6
>- SolusVM Control Panel
>- Daily & Quick Backups (Free)
>- Windows 2008 & 2012 Available for Plans 1024MB & Over
>- [$5.00/mo - Annual Billing Available](https://igniteservers.com/whmcs/cart.php?a=add&pid=154)

Other KVM Plans Available @ [IgniteServers](https://IgniteServers.com)
